comments:

To reproduce this problem, start the service wizard for a TD scenario and 
select testing on the first page.  Click all the way to the test page and then 
click back to the first page and click finish.
Can't reproduce this on WTP 1.5 M5 driver. Please reopen if you're still seeing it.
